title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 463.4 - Social services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 463.4 - Social services

State Regulations

Upon oral or written request, such services shall be
provided promptly, within 30 days of the request, to eligible persons to enable
them to utilize family-planning medical and education resources. They are to be
provided directly by services staff or by referral to a licensed
family-planning center or clinic. (a) Social services means helping and enabling eligible persons to utilize the
educational and medical resources available, including help as needed and
requested with related personal problems, with selecting the appropriate
resource and with facilitating arrangements such as transportation. (b) Social services may be purchased by a
social services department from a licensed family-planning center or
clinic. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
463.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
